# GroupSessionEvent.Action.QueueChange.Item

**Structure**

Detailed information about an item involved in a queue change.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Item
```

## Overview

Before you notify a participant about a queue-related change, create an item that contains the name of the song or container that changed. Use this item to configure a [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionEvent/Action-swift.struct/QueueChange] structure with additional details about the change.

## Creating the item

- **song(_:)**: Creates an item that contains the name of a song.
- **container(_:)**: Creates an item that contains the name of a container.

items.description: Creates an item that contains the name of a song.
items.name: song(_:)

items.description: Creates an item that contains the name of a container.
items.name: container(_:)

title: GroupSessionEvent.Action.QueueChange.Item
